description:
The investment seeks to track the investment results (before the fund's fees and expenses) of the S&P U.S. Spin-Off Index (the "underlying index").
 The fund generally will invest at least 90% of its total assets in the securities that comprise the underlying index. The index is designed to measure the performance of U.S. companies that have been spun off from larger corporations within the past four years. The fund is non-diversified.
